wikipedia_page.main: Morris John Stevenson (16 April 1943 – 22 July 2014) was a Scottish footballer who played as a forward.

response: *22 July: Morris Stevenson, 71, Motherwell, Hibernian, Morton, Dundee United and Berwick Rangers inside forward.
* 22 July 2014: Morris Stevenson, 71, former Luton Town inside forward.
